title: KLEEN HANDLER Heavy Duty Commercial Mop Head Replacement, Wet Industrial Cotton Looped End String Cleaning Mop Head Refill, Blue Mop, Universal Headband
features: KLEEN HANDLER Heavy Duty Mop Head, Blue Mop Head Replacement, 1 Mophead (Medium, 16 oz)

DURABILITY & MATERIAL – 16 oz. replacement mop head, 4-ply twist yarn made from cotton and blended fibers for scratch free, wet, and dry mopping. Excellent water absorption & retention, for effective floor cleaning and drying, an ideal balance of performance, durability & appearance. Commercial mop heads are durable and safe to use on all hard surfaces.

DESIGNED FOR FUNCTION – Looped end mop reduces fraying, virtually eliminating lint and untwisting of string mops! The time saver tail band makes cleaning more efficient! The looped mop design reduces friction between the floor, so that the mop glides rather than drags smoothly over the surface. While also improving the cleaning performance providing greater coverage for fast and efficient use.

UNIVERSAL FIT – Universal headband fits clamp style and side loading mop handles (sold separately). The headband resists moisture retention so the mop head can dry between uses. Heavy duty mop heads are for commercial, industrial, and residential use. The all purpose mop is suitable for: industrial cleaning, commercial cleaning, janitorial supplies, and household environments.

WASHABLE INDUSTRIAL MOP HEAD – Absorbent mop heads are launderable for extended long-term usage. The looped-end yarn design enhances productivity and is durable for machine washing. Long-lasting fibers allow the mop head to be washed many times giving it a longer service life. This washable mophead is launderable up to 100 times!

USED FOR VARIOUS ENVIRONMENTS: Cotton mop head designed for floor cleaning in commercial, industrial, and residential use. Perfect for a janitorial mop, mop head refills, heavy duty cleaning mops, mophead replacements, etc!
description: Product Description KLEEN HANDLER Heavy Duty Commercial Mop Head Replacement KLEEN HANDLER HEAVY DUTY Commercial Universal Headband Blend Mops are designed with high quality, custom 4-ply blend yarn for superior strength and absorbency to clean up spills quickly. The looped-end also improves cleaning performance while providing greater floor coverage for fast and efficient use. The headband is universal, designed to fit side loading and clamp style mop handles. (*Mop handles are sold separately). These heavy duty mop heads are for commercial, industrial, and residential use. This all-purpose mop is suitable for any cleaning job including: industrial cleaning, janitorial, and household environments. Design The looped-end construction will keep mop ends from fraying, and the time saver tail-band makes cleaning more efficient. Our looped-end design reduces friction between the floor, so that the mop glides rather than drags smoothly over the surface. The looped-end also improves cleaning performance while providing greater coverage for fast and efficient use. Material This mop is a 4-ply loose twist yarn, made from cotton and blended fibers. This provides the ideal balance of performance, durability and appearance. Combining the advantages of several different fibers, high strength, excellent water absorption & retention, for effective floor cleaning and drying. The headband resists moisture retention so the mop head can dry between uses. Safe This mop is safe to use on all hard surfaces for scratch free, wet and dry mopping. Well suited for commercial, industrial, and residential use. This mop has been designed for any cleaning task including: industrial cleaning, janitorial, and household environments. Washable Absorbent mop heads are launderable for extended long-term usage. Looped-end yarn design in the mop enhances productivity and is durable for machine washing. Long-lasting fibres allows mop head to be laundered many times giving it a longer service life. This mop is launderable up to 100 times for long-lasting durability.
